page.title: 18FARMING
page.content:
{ East Radley. By Simon James.
East Radley is where I live, it is shaped like an L. It is built of rubble and cob.It has a thatched roof. {MACHINERY It has 1 tractor, 1 hayturner, 1 barleymill, 1 plough, 1 milk machine. {LIVESTOCK The farm keeps cows, ducks, sheep, goats, and pigs. It has 8 cows, 12 sheep, 3 goats, 3 pigs, 10 ducks and 24 chickens. {THE GROUNDS It has 3 fields. It has 8 outbuildings and a larger pond. We are trying to buy another 6 to 7 acres. Lower Radley is the oldest farm, and gradually MR RADLEY increased his farms to three.
